courses.course_desc: This laboratory course is designed to acquaint the student with the fundamentals of biological science and introductory chemistry. It cannot be taken for credit by science majors.
courses.course_credits:
3 Credit Hours 
3 Lecture Contact Hours 
2 Lab Contact Hours
courses.course_attributes: Course Attribute(s): Life & Phys Sciences Core 030|Dif Tui- Science & Engineering

courses.course_desc: This laboratory course acquaints students with the fundamentals of chemistry and earth space science. It is non-creditable for science majors but is a required course for select education majors.  Prerequisites: PHYS 1310 or PHYS 1315 or PHYS 1320 or PHYS 1325 or PHYS 1360 or PHYS 1365 or PHYS 1370 or PHYS 1410 or PHYS 1420 any with grade of C or better.
courses.course_credits:
3 Credit Hours 
3 Lecture Contact Hours 
2 Lab Contact Hours
courses.course_attributes: Course Attribute(s): Dif Tui- Science & Engineering|Lab Required
